title: 'Honest opinion after using months'
body: Everything except below mentioned issues works well. The display is so poor that it doesn't even support higher resolution than 1080p in YouTube . They've made this with 200mp sensor but doesn't even record videos higher than FHD, which below 10K phones used to do back in the days but the clicks are not so boring. They never cared to put a mesh or anything in the front speaker which goes beside the ears while calling, it's a wide long hollow part. There're few restrictions in the software as mentioned above in case of video recording and display outputs. Don't be fooled by the so called brand value.

title: 'Worst phone I have ever used.'
body: My phone was delivered on saturday 7th October 23, It's heated like anything while charging. After identify this issue i tried for replacement which is valid till 14th October 23 but there is no options and automatically routed to install another app for troubleshooting. Please don't buy at all and same rate you will definitely get a good phones in the market for other brands.

title: 'Hyped brand and average to poor product confusing specs'
body: 'With suggestions from many finally I decided to go for brand one plus but I have to regret my after 3 days of use. Pros. Decent refresh rate Good data rate Oxygen os Cons Below par camera and camera software Charging only for namesake fast charging took more than 52 mins to charge Charger heating too much Plastic back and cheap plastic sold Display I m not sure of what type some mention lcd some as amoled. But does not looks to be amoled No value for money Side mount fingerprint is pathetic to use'
